唔覺得jimmy會帶得起49

agger. jimmy係back up QB材料 佢夠穩定 做d simple play /bullet short pass還可以 但唔覺佢可以發展到一線qb 睇佢d medium/deep lob pass真係見哂底 所以我幾贊成今次trade belichick應該係見到今年pats既defense重組未完成 hightower仲要傷埋 o line又唔生性 如果brady傷左 有無jimmy都係玩撚完 一定唔夠carry埋defense失既分 索性trade個draft pick放眼下一季

Pats 係用佢加一個19年 low 3rd round pick 換一個18年 high 2nd round pick
值唔值真係見仁見智

報道話可能係jimmy想走
咁強留都冇用啦

留係pats做backup qb簽唔到咩靚contracts superbowl rings都有2隻 係時候要賺下錢

都啱既
而且jimmy g 26歲已經有兩隻rings 跟logan ryan 一樣出去搵真銀仲好

睇返報導 Pats 真係想留佢搵佢接班
唔介意俾 starter money 佢
Draft 前 Browns 開到 early second round pick 呢個價都不為所動
如果真係覺得佢係 backup 料一早 trade 咗
奈何 Brady 真係唔識老
而佢除咗要 starter money
仲想要 starter playing time

宜家成個 trade 最柒係 Browns
呢個價佢地絕對俾得起有餘
揸住一大堆 pick 幾大都搏

A ball carrier fumbles the ball within the field of play forward into his opponents end zone and the loose ball then goes out of bounds behind or above his opponent's goal line, is recovered and downed by an opposing player in the end zone, or touches the pylon. The opposing team would be awarded the touchback.

1. Fumble: Lose possession of ball 。甩手果下計fumble
2. The Jets player regained the possession/recovered the ball = the loose ball goes out of bound
3. Before goal line
4. Out of the bound before recovering the ball and touching the pylon. So it’s a touchback instead of touch down.

Rule is rule. The judgement is legitimate, but the rule is controversial.

正路應該係 stand
Mike Pereira 同 Dean Blandino 都覺得唔應該 overturned

Blandino and Pereira agreed there was a fumble, but felt Seferian-Jenkins either regained control in time or that it was too close to overturn the ruling on the field.

"It did look like he regained control and that left knee might have just touched inbounds before he slid out of bounds," Blandino said. "There were a lot of ifs and mights ... and usually that means the call on the field should stand."

Pereira concurred, saying it appeared to him that Seferian-Jenkins regained control, "but ultimately, I would say if it has to be 'clear and obvious,' it just didn't seem to me that it was."

通常new year’s 6 bowls最多人留意: Orange, Fiesta, Peach, Cotton, Sugar & Rose

通常每個bowl會同兩個conference有聯繫，例如Rose bowl平時係由BIG10冠軍對PAC12冠軍
